department.dept_long_name: Department of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology

course.title: Microbial Evolution
course.description: An examination of the evolution of microbes through an integration of lectures and discussion of primary literature. We will focus on a series of broad questions for which we will draw upon knowledge from both lab-based study of experimental microcosms and comparative studies of natural populations. Notably, students will conduct their own experimental evolution projects using 'digital organisms'.
course.prerequisites: Life Sciences 1a and Life Sciences 1b or equivalent required.
